Trade/Device Name(s): U-RIGHT TD-4116 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
U-RIGHT TD-4116 Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): U-RIGHT TD-4116 Pro Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for U-RIGHT TD-4116 and TD-4116 Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites; for self-testing by people with diabetes (TD-4116) and for professional use in clinical settings (TD-4116 Pro) as an aid to monitor diabetes control, not for diagnosis, screening, or use on neonates
